mapper.select: /* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyListCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1
/* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectBizSectSrhList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectAgrSrhList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyHistList */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
/* BizMhdlgAplyMapper.selectMhdlgAplyExcel */ SELECT '컬럼정보' AS COL FROM irsuser.TEMP_TABLE WHERE 1 = 1 ORDER BY TEMP_SEQ ASC
